blogs.blogtext: The National Pension System (NPS) is a defined-contribution pension system in India regulated by the Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA) which is under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Finance of the Government  National Pension System Trust (NPS Trust) was established by PFRDA as per the provisions o

blogs.title: Global warming
blogs.blogtext: Global warming, the phenomenon of increasing average air temperatures near the surface of Earth over the past one to two cens climate has changed over almost every conceivable timescale since the beginning of geologic time and that human activities since at least the beginning of the Industrial Revolution have a growing influence over the pace and extent of present-day climate change.
